mapper.sql: SELECT NO, ID, NICKNAME, PASSWORD, ROLE, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, BIRTH, STATUS, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, O_PROFILEIMGNAME, R_PROFILEIMGNAME FROM MEMBER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( NO, ID, NICKNAME, PASSWORD, ROLE, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, BIRTH, STATUS, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, O_PROFILEIMGNAME, R_PROFILEIMGNAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{nickname}, #{password}, DEFAULT, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address}, #{birth}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, NULL, NULL )
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET NAME = #{name}, NICKNAME = #{nickname}, PHONE = #{phone}, EMAIL = #{email}, ADDRESS = #{address}, BIRTH = #{birth}, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE NO = #{no}
mapper.delete: UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE NO = #{no}
mapper.update: update MP_MEMBER set MEMBER_PW = #{memberPw} where MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} and MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from MP_MEMBER where MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} and MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
